description: Hyundai has delivered quality for years and this car is no exception. This Hyundai Tucson  2013  has travelled a total of 57000km and features a Tiptronic transmission system as well as other great features. Priced at Rs.6100000, this car is fantastic value for money. Don’t forget to mention Carmudi when you contact the seller!
name: Hyundai Tucson  2013
